item.title: Business
item.description: what to do here? Scroll / Click left or right to get more questions. Don't worry; there are no scores, and no data is recorded, so have fun! the question is... Which area had the highest number of new businesses created in year 2018? 42.8% This is no correct. But please, give another try! 39.2% This is Correct!
